biotools.summary: Suite of online tools for the analysis and design of DNA and RNA oligomers. Tools include those for selection of PCR primers, antisense oligonucleotides, or sequences for RNA interference, as well as tools for calculation of secondary structures.

bioschemas.name: IDT SciTools
bioschemas.summary: Suite of online tools for the analysis and design of DNA and RNA oligomers. Tools include those for selection of PCR primers, antisense oligonucleotides, or sequences for RNA interference, as well as tools for calculation of secondary structures.
